data.dataset module

class data.dataset.SatelliteSegmentationDataset(img_dir, mask_dir, transform=None)[source]

Bases: Dataset

data.preprocessing module

Image pre-processing utils

data.preprocessing.clip_prodes(prodes_path, sentinel_processed_path, output_path)[source]

Clip PRODES dataset to match the processed Sentinel-2 data.

data.preprocessing.convert_forest_to_binary(input_tiff, output_tiff, forest_value)[source]

Converts a single-band classified raster to a binary mask. - Pixels matching forest_value → White (255) (Forest) - All other pixels → Black (0) (Background)

data.preprocessing.process_sentinel(input_folder, output_path)[source]

Process Sentinel-2 JP2 files: reproject, resample, scale, and save as a GeoTIFF.

data.preprocessing.process_sentinel_fast(input_folder, output_path)[source]

Efficiently read Sentinel-2 JP2 files (B02, B03, B04, B08) and save as a single GeoTIFF.

data.preprocessing.split_dataset(base_path, output_path, train_ratio=0.8, val_ratio=0.15, test_ratio=0.05)[source]
data.preprocessing.tile_datasets(sentinel_path, prodes_path, root_folder, prefix='')[source]

Generate 512x512 non-overlapping tiles for Sentinel-2 and PRODES datasets.
